name: Mayank.GitHub.io
body:
PROJECTS
Hotel Management System:
Hotel Management System is an ideal software solution for Hospitality Industry that can be used at hotels, motels, inns, resorts, lodges, hostel, military guest houses, ranch, suites, apartments, medical centers and bed, breakfast operations. Our product Hotel Management System is a comprehensive software suite consisting of integrated modules for various aspects of hotel management.

Visitor Management System:
VMS are a simple, perfect and secure Visitor Management Software for Corporate, Industries, Modern Organization, and Research Centers and for multiple tenants like Tec part, Business Centers, Commercial complex, campus and residential complexes alsoâ€¦ 

Library Management System:
Library Management System is a software used to manages the catalog of a library. This helps to keep the records of whole transactions of the books available in the library.

Bank Management System:
To develop a software for solving financial applications of a customer in a banking environment in order to nurture the needs of an end banking user by providing various ways to perform banking tasks. 

Event Monitoring and Flow Analysis Tool:
Our application is a powerful tool for analyzing captured data from targeted devices, servers, networks, and applications and this application is used in wide variety of gathering methods, supports Business and IT Service, Reporting, Discovery and Mapping, dashboards, and many other features to facilitate the monitoring and management of your environment.

EDUCATION

Others

CERTIFICATIONS

ISTQB Software Testing, 2015

INITIATIVES
Volunteer
Computer Society of India (CSI) 
2015 | Science of Technology
Join Computer Society of India (CSI) the first and largest body of computer professionals in India. CSI is a non-profit organization and its members are committed to the advancement of theory and practice of Computer Engineering and Technology Systems.

Indian Society For Technical Education (ISTE)
2015 | Science of Technology
The Indian Society for Technical Education (ISTE) is the leading National Professional non-profit making Society for the Technical Education System in our country with the motto of Career Development of Teachers and Personality Development of Students and overall development of our Technical Education System.
